enum.name: boolean
enum.description: A "true" or "false" value, from the JSON "true" or "false" productions

enum.name: object
enum.description: An unordered set of properties mapping a string to an instance, from the JSON "object" production.  If a "type" is not provided in a schema definition it will default to "object".

enum.name: array
enum.description: An ordered list of instances, from the JSON "array" production

enum.name: number
enum.description: An arbitrary-precision, base-10 decimal number value, from the JSON "number" production

enum.name: string
enum.description: A string of Unicode code points, from the JSON "string" production

enum.name: integer
enum.description: A number with no fractional part (no decimals).
